name: Feather Of Praying 羽翼的祈愿
description: Everyone has their own story and also has a different fate from others. No matter how cruel the reality is, we all have the right to hope for the future, look forward to, and look forward to, wishing that tomorrow will be better.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows XP Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.4GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 2000 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA  GTX 560SE DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space
